response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth $15,000 to you, but I understand that everyone wants to get the best deal possible. I'm offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is an exclusive opportunity to secure such a high-quality product at a price that still allows me to appreciate its true worth. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.", "product_price": 12000}
